name: amivantamabe

name: azacitidina

name: bussulfano

name: Carmustina

name: docetaxel
stabilityDiluted: 6h TA Se bolsa isenta de PVC 48h SR¹

name: etoposídeo (VP-16)

name: irinotecano (CPT-11)

name: nivolumabe

name: temozolomida

name: trabectedina

name: vinflunina
